import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Product({product}) { const discountPercentage = Math.round(((product.initPrice - product.price) / product.initPrice) * 100); return (
{discountPercentage}%
{product.name}
{product.initPrice.toLocaleString('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' })} {product.price.toLocaleString('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' })} ) } export default Product
